'''Jade Helm''' was a military training exercise conducted by the United States Special Operations Command in 2015. The exercise was designed to simulate complex overseas combat environments<ref>https://www.statesman.com/story/news/local/2016/09/23/5-things-you-should-know-about-jade-helm-15/9807539007/</ref>. The exercise involving the deployment of thousands of military personnel across several states, including Texas, Arizona, and New Mexico. 

Jade Helm became the subject of various conspiracy theories and unfounded claims by some far-right groups and individuals, who alleged that the exercise was a cover for a government takeover or martial law. Their claims were widely debunked, and the exercise ended without incident.
